CHANGELOG

20th August 2020 - Channel Source skills now have mutual-cooldowns - using any one skill puts all of them on cooldown. Mutual Cooldowns are enabled by default but can be toggled-off using the mod-menu. (The mutual cooldown feature requires the script-extender). Created the Skill-Config-Menu that interfaces with my latest mod-project. The skill config menu will automatically become available for users when I release that mod.

14th May 2020 - Implemented Mod-Menu dialog. Renamed and swapped skills. Created a script to grant skillbooks that the player missed in their playthrough; recipes exist for back-compatibility. Implemented an in-game changelog and notification system. Full localization pass. Divinity Unleashed compatibility can now be toggled with the mod-menu, old database-toggle removed. Fixed CS-I skillbook being consumable.

10th April 2020 - Added Divinity Unleashed Compatibility Script. Assigned stats to the skillbooks (forgot to do this at launch).

20th March 2020 - Initial Release.

Hello sourcerors,
This letter is to notify you that the Channel-Source mod has been updated. You can safely discard both this letter and the changelog if you do not wish to read them.
Now, before we begin, I'd like to point out that the features of this update will only apply if the script-extender is installed. The script-extender is not strictly required to use the most basic-features of this mod, however, I'd recommend installing it to access the more advanced functions like this one. With this update, casting any channel-source skill will put all other channel-source skills on cooldown aswell. Mutual-Cooldowns are enabled by default because I like this mechanic more :) . You can toggle this feature using the mod-menu and revert back at any time. The update also makes this mod ready to integrate with my next mod-project (when it launches). It will allow you to change the stat-attributes of these skills and customize the mod to your taste.

A Friend.
